Mrs. Dennis' Class Supply List
Welcome to 2nd Grade! Here is a list of things that your child will
need for class! If you are having difficulty finding anything or if it is
a financial burden, please don't hesitate to let me know. I'm
happy to help if I can.
Backpack
Pencil Box- (regular size- no room for a large one)
Ticonderoga Pencils- (No mechanical, please)
• A package of Red Lead Pencils or Red Lead Pens- (at least 4)
• Pencil top erasers
1 Blue 70 page spiral notebook- (wide ruled)
A package of Dry Erase Markers- (any color at least 4)
2 boxes of 24 count Crayola Crayons
y y
• Scissors
A large package of Glue Sticks- (we use a lot of these)
• 2 Meade Five Star Green Plastic Folders with pockets- (no paper one
do not write names in folders please)
• 2 Plastic Folders with pockets- (1 Yellow, 1 Blue- do not write names
folders please)
• 1 Large Boxes of Tissues
• 1 box of Gallon size Ziploc Bags
• A package of Crayola Twistables- (12 count)
• 1 packages of white index cards
Please DO NOT put your child's name on the plastic folders.
Please have your child bring his or her supplies to either on Back to
School Niaht. which will be on August 14 from 4-6pm or on the first
day of school.
1 am looking forward to a great year! See you soon!
Mrs. Dennis
